text: However, at this time, it is unlikely that credit card details have been affected, given that its main e-commerce website does not store this information, Natura &Co said in a securities filing without elaborating.The cmpany announced on Tuesday announced that Avon was targeted in a cyber incident that partially hit operations, but did not say how its subsidiary was affected and when the problem would be solved.Natura &Co agreed to buy rival Avon Products via a share swap deal in May 2019, creating the worlds fourth-largest pure-play beauty group.Shares in Natura&Co were trading 2% down on Friday at 40.05 reais.
